dnr-application-type.required: Select what the application was for

dnr-full-name.required: Enter the main applicant's full name
dnr-full-name.minlength: Applicant's full name must be between 3 and 250 characters
dnr-full-name.maxlength: Applicant's full name must be between 3 and 250 characters
dnr-full-name.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL

dnr-dob.required: Enter the applicant's date of birth
dnr-dob.before: Main applicant's date of birth must be in the past
dnr-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth
dnr-dob.date: Enter a real date of birth

dnr-nationality.required: Select the main applicant's country of nationality

dnr-further-leave-to-remain.required: Select which type of further leave you applied for

dnr-visa-type.required: Select what type of visa the application was for

dnr-reference-number.required: You must provide a reference number. Select one you can provide

dnr-record-number.minlength: Record number must be between 9 and 12 characters. For example, ROD123456789 or 123456789
dnr-record-number.maxlength: Record number must be between 9 and 12 characters. For example, ROD123456789 or 123456789
dnr-record-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL
dnr-record-number.recordNum: Enter a real record number. For example, ROD123456789

dnr-case-id.minlength: Case ID must be at least 8 numbers
dnr-case-id.maxlength: Case ID cannot be more than 8 numbers
dnr-case-id.numeric: Case ID can only include numbers
dnr-case-id.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL

dnr-ho-reference-number.required: Enter a Home Office reference number
dnr-ho-reference-number.minlength: Home Office reference must be at least 8 characters
dnr-ho-reference-number.maxlength: Home Office reference number cannot be more than 8 numbers
dnr-ho-reference-number.hoRefNum: Home Office reference number must start with a letter, followed by 7 numbers
dnr-ho-reference-number.specialCharacter: Home Office reference number must only include letters and numbers
dnr-ho-reference-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL

dnr-payment-reference-number.maxlength: Payment reference number cannot be more than 100 characters
dnr-payment-reference-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL

dnr-courier-reference-number.maxlength: Courier reference number cannot be more than 100 characters
dnr-courier-reference-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL

dnr-email.minlength: Email address must be between 6 and 256 characters
dnr-email.maxlength: Email address must be between 6 and 256 characters

dnr-telephone.minlength: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
dnr-telephone.maxlength: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
dnr-telephone.validInternationalPhoneNumber: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
dnr-telephone.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL
